"Xitrae": "Testing, 1-2-3! Can you hear me? I'm speaking with <%me>, right?"
"Sorry for calling you out of the blue. I'm Xitrae; I'm in charge of managing supplies for ARKS."
"I hear you're someone that people can rely on. And well, I've got a bit of a request for you."
"Think you could come visit me when you're free? I'll fill you in on the details when you arrive."
"<%me>! Hello again! Supply Manager Xitrae here again."
"I've got another favor to ask you. Could you come visit me?"
